subject: Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
lead_paragraph: In the obscure sport of carriage driving, the marquee discipline consists of four horses or ponies dragging what looks like an open stagecoach through three events: presentation, dressage and the marathon.
snippet: In the obscure sport of carriage driving, the marquee discipline consists of four horses or ponies dragging what looks like an open stagecoach through three events: presentation, dressage and the marathon.
